phrases: Yakov, you were the best coach I ever had.
If you walk away now, you can never come back!
I am sorry I cannot do as you say this time.
You do not get to say that when you have never done as I said in the first place!
You should come visit Japan, Yakov.
Why are not you answering your cell?!
There is a rumor that Victor's going to be Yuri's coach!
I am in a bit of a slump right now,
but I am a top figure skater certified by the JSF!
Back home for the first time in five years, I was thinking of how to keep my career going...
when my idol, Victor, suddenly appeared!
I am still in denial that this is actually happening!
By the way, Victor Nikiforov is a living legend in figure skating.
I never dreamed he would be interested in me, but...
Starting today, I am your coach.
I will make you win the Grand Prix Final.
What is he saying, standing there buck naked?
Why is Victor sleeping in one of the inn's robes?!
He soaked in the hot spring and had dinner, then fell asleep...
It is big news in Russia.
He is taking next season off and is considering his next move.
They are also saying that when he saw the video of you skating his routine,
he was struck with inspiration, and that is when he decided to be your coach.
Victor came here because he chose you, Yuri.
Victor went to Japan to become Yuri Katsuki's coach?
Did he forget what he promised me?
Explain this to me, damn it!
Victor wants to take time off until he finds his motivation again.
Personally, I doubt he will be able to return if he takes a break now.
He is going to coach Katsuki Yuri in Japan
That man only thinks of himself!
He will never be anyone's coach!
Um, what would you like to eat?
As your coach, I would like to know what your favorite food is, Yuri.
Our specialty, the pork cutlet bowl, extra-large!
I am glad you like it.
so he was only allowed to eat it when he won a competition.
So have you eaten this pork cutlet bowl recently?
With that pig's body of yours,
You need to get back to your weight at last year's Grand Prix Final, at the least...
or I can never coach you.
Until then, no more pork cutlet bowls.
I feel like I should be offended...
Hey, this luggage is in the way.
Can you take it to the room where I will be staying?
I am sorry it is so small.
We only had an unused banquet room available.
You can pay the coaching fee after you achieve success!
Yuri, tell me everything about you.
What kind of rink do you skate at?
Is there a girl you like?
let us build some trust in our relationship.
I am still scared to be close to him.
As your coach, there is so much I need to learn about you.
because I always put him on such a high pedestal,
and now he is right here...
My heart's pounding because of how happy I am.
I will be Yuri's coach from now on.
Victor's really going to be Yuri's coach?!
It is not for the public, you skating otaku trio!
He says he would like to use this rink as our home base for now.
I will talk to the higher-ups.
It is like a dream come true!
By the time I was twelve,
Victor, four years my senior, was already number one in the world.
Junior World Championships, Gold Victor Nikiforov Sofia, Bulgaria
I have imitated him for years, trying to catch up to him.
How could seeing the video of me skating his routine inspire him?
How did I inspire you, Victor?
The little piggy cannot enter the rink until he drops some body fat.
Are you really serious about making me win?
Maybe he just wanted an excuse to take a break.
That is what I suspect, too, but...
You decided to keep skating, did not you?
You need to take advantage of Victor!
Okay, let us get you slimmed down!
She used to travel the world as a dancer.
I spent more time in her ballet class than at home.
I even started skating because Minako-sensei urged me to.
She is always cheered me on,
but she likes to meddle, too.
Do you have feelings for Minako?
Yuri, what is that castle over there?
So it is true that he is going to be Katsuki Yuri's coach...
Does he want to become a ninja or something?
Is it true that Victor is here?!
Can we share a bath with him?!
It is been a long time since we had so many customers!
Congratulations on Advancing to the Grand Prix, Skater Katsuki Yuri
We would like to film a special feature!
I want to learn how to skate, too!
C-Can I take a photo with you?
Hasetsu City Hasetsu Float Statue Photos are best taken from right here!
If I post this, Yakov will know I am here!
Victor's been uploading tons of pictures with this city tagged...
Why are you in Japan, too?!
You know how important this time before your senior debut is, right?!
I am not coming back to Russia until Victor makes good on his promise!
I have my own plan, okay?
I am supposed to do a triple Salchow next.
I told you repeatedly that quads are off-limits because your body's still developing!
If you cannot follow orders, then quit!
It is none of your business!
I used to get scolded for doing that, too.
You can win, even without quads.
I would bet money on it.
You can win the Junior World Championship.
Okay, if I win without quad jumps,
then choreograph a program just for me!
When you win the Junior World Championship, come see me.
I will give you the best senior debut ever.
Are you a fan of Victor's?
There is a skating rink below the castle.
It is reserved, and it is a private practice session!
He is the junior world champion...
My weight's back to what it was before the Grand Prix Final!
Now I will finally get Victor's permission to skate.
And why is he furious at me?!
The Japanese Yuri and the Russian Yuri are both here.
We can go ahead with that, right?
He promised me first that he would choreograph a program for me.
We have not gotten to talking about programs or anything.
You make him take a whole year off, and to do what?
Is not getting him as a coach enough?
As if a guy who would sob in a toilet stall at the Grand Prix Final
can change at all just by getting Victor as a coach!
I do not really get the whole picture, so you should ask him yourself.
Victor came all the way to Hasetsu because he wanted to.
They are for the short program Victor was practicing for next season.
Victor was already putting together routines for next season.
Surprising the audience has always been his top priority.
He had the whole world in his hands.
But now, no matter what he does, no one's surprised anymore.
He knows that better than anyone.
If you do not have any inspiration left, you are as good as dead.
If he is going to take next season off,
I wonder if he will let me use his program.
I know I can surprise people more.
I need Victor's help if I am going to make my senior debut
and win the Grand Prix Final.
You look like you are doing great, Victor!
I am surprised Yakov let you come.
I am guessing I forgot some promise I made.
But you knew I was the forgetful type, right?
Yeah, I am painfully aware of that.
But a promise is a promise!
You will choreograph my new program, Victor!
Let us go back to Russia!
Tomorrow, I will choreograph a program for both of you
to the same music I am using in my short program.
No, this piece has several different arrangements.
I was trying to decide which one to use.
I will think of a different program for each of you, of course.
I will reveal the programs in one week!
You will compete to see who can surprise the audience more!
Let us take a step back here.
I do not want to be punished for losing...
Victor will do whatever the winner says!
If those are the terms, I am in!
I love that kind of thing!
Will you let us organize the event?
A face-off between Yuri of Russia and Yuri of Japan!
Hasetsu Exhibition Hot Springs on Ice Presented by Victor Nikiforov
One week from now, the Hot Springs on Ice show will premiere
If you get Victor to yourself all the time, it will not be a fair match!
It is not like you care what I think.
I cannot take a bath with other people!
The pork cutlet bowl is good, is not it?
He looks just like my idol, The Blond Takao!
I need to clean it up!
That Yuri has more potential than I do.
He is pretty confident, saying he will win the Grand Prix Final on his first run as a senior.
Above all, he is comfortable in front of Victor.
Compared to me, he is much more...
At a time like this, he would be at Minako-san's place or Ice Castle.
He is always been that way.
By my place, she meant my ballet studio.
Whenever Yuri gets anxious, he always wants to practice.
I usually go along with him.
Ice Castle let us him skate anytime if it is not booked already.
Yuri was able to grow because he had a place
where he could practice alone whenever he got anxious.
but he was gifted with more free time than anyone else to practice.
He is always come here to practice by himself.
It always made me think he really loved skating.
He did not even play with his friends.
Well, he was never very good at making them.
Skating aside, he is not good at putting himself out there.
I do not want this to be the end for him.
I hope Victor will bring out a side of Yuri-kun that we have never seen before.
So, a magic spell to change the little piggy into a prince...
I know a lot more about Yuri now.
Private Practice Session Reserved All Day Apologies for the Inconvenience
Hot Springs on Ice Is a Go! Katsuki Yuri Yuri Plisetsky Location: Ice Castle Hasetsu
Victor will finally start teaching me today.
Whether this is my last season or not rides on this.
I will never win if I wimp out here!
I cannot lose this Hot Springs on Ice match!
And then I will aim for the Grand Prix Final!
First, let us have you two listen to the music.
This piece comes in two arrangements, each with a different theme.
Have you ever thought about love?
Then what do you feel when you listen to this music?
It is very clear and innocent,
like someone who does not know what love is yet.
I do not like this piece.
This innocence crap makes me want to barf.
It is like a completely different song.
I want to skate to this one!
The first piece is On Love: Agape.
And this piece is On Love: Eros.
I will have you two skate to these opposing themes.
This is how I am assigning them.
Yuri, you will skate to Eros!
Yurio, you will skate to Agape!
That piece is not me at all!
You have to do the opposite of what people expect.
How else will you surprise them?
Actually, you are both far more ordinary and mediocre than you think.
You need to be more self-aware.
I am surprised you think you can choose your own image.
From the audience's perspective, you are just a piglet and a kitten.
Hasetsu Exhibition Hot Springs on Ice Victor Nikiforov Presents
If you are not up to my standards by next week,
I will not choreograph either of your programs.
Both of you are my fans, so I am sure you will manage.
My senior division debut depends on it!
You would better give me a program that will let me win!
It is up to you whether you win or not.
If I skated the program, I would win for sure.
If I win, Victor, you are coming back to Russia.
And you will be my coach!
What would you like to do if you win?
I want to eat pork cutlet bowls with you, Victor.
I want to keep on winning, and keep on eating pork cutlet bowls!
So I will skate to Eros!
I will give it all the eros I have got!
Hasetsu Exhibition: Hot Springs On Ice in 7 Days
That is exactly what I like!
I wonder, which of you will be able to satisfy me?
I will satisfy you for sure!
The Third Skate I Am Eros, and Eros Is Me?!
I Am Eros, and Eros Is Me?!
